channel.title: The Thousand Kingdoms
channel.description: Recent content on The Thousand Kingdoms

item.title: Fedoriw, Anatoly
item.description: Ella’s mentor for her graduate program.

item.title: Harris, Charlotte 'Charlie'
item.description: Relationships Mother Melissa Harris Father. Alistair Harris Cousin Astor Harris Ella’s best friend and fellow first-year Physics masters student, but is partying a bit too much since her move up from University of Georgia. From a rich Southern heritage in Savannah of the sort that has debutante balls (which she ditched out of to get drunk and have sex with her boyfriend in her parents car)

item.title: Adrahasis
item.description: Adrahasis is the unofficial leader of the cohort and is considered a bit of a philosopher warrior of the group. He has a strong grasp of strategy but is not the strongest at tactics and on the ground decisions.

item.title: Ansheth
item.description: Fanatical assassin of the drow serving Ekerri.

item.title: Aoife
item.description: 158cm / 5'2" petite with golden skin, blue butterfly wings. Ella was almost seduced by her during a party.

item.title: Arthurs, Donna
item.description: Ella’s sparring partner. Very tall at 177cm / 5'10" and fit. Generally a flat affect with little emotion shown. Strawberry blonde pixie cut, grey-blue eyes, and freckled skin.

item.title: Arthurs, Donna
item.description: Ella’s sparring partner. Very tall at 177cm / 5'10" and fit. Generally a flat affect with little emotion shown. Strawberry blonde pixie cut, grey-blue eyes, and freckled skin.

item.title: Davcina
item.description: Davcina is tall and handsome with stern features. Her eyes were a storm at sea blue-grey, and she had high sharp cheekbones. She is very angular looking and has a severe face but is actually very sweet and compassionate. Likes hugs type of person.

item.title: Ekerri (Ascended)
item.description: Strange monarch who crowned Elli. Obsidian skin and glowing white crystalline eyes

item.title: Etana
item.description: Etana is long and lean with dark long hair in long braids with beads woven into the ends of them. He is very attractive but has a raspy voice from a training incident where he got punched in the throat. Personality is shy and withdrawn generally.

item.title: Kothin
item.description: The first dwarf that Ella has met. Long beard, 121cm / 4’ tall. Faceted inhuman features with solid black eyes.

item.title: Ndereba, Jade
item.description: Relationships Brother Craig Ndereba Roommate Ella Jindal-Witten Ella’s studio roommate from Kenya, tall 172m / 5'8" with dark black skin and leaning way into a 1970s style including massive afro. Taking a masters in Film & Television at NYU. A bit conceited as she used to model across Africa, but struggling with not being top of the heap in NYC.

item.title: Park, Do-Yun
item.description: Relationships Spouse Johanna Son Hanuel Park Great-grandson Jae-Young Park

item.title: Park, Hanuel
item.description: Relationships Father Do-Yun Park Mother Johanna Grandson Jae-Young Park

item.title: Park, Jae-Young
item.description: Relationships Great-grandfather Do-Yun Park Great-grandmother Johanna Grandfather Hanuel Park Ex-girlfriend Ella Jindal-Witten Ella’s ex-boyfriend. In human guise, he is 180cm / 5'11" tall and handsome with sharp cheekbones and a boyish haircut. Without his ring, his elfin features come to the fore, his eyes cant to an extreme degree, his features become even more defined and sharper, his ears pointed.

item.title: Slattery, Harlan
item.description: Relationships Brother Luke Slattery Luke’s identical twin - no beard. From Texas.

item.title: Tauthe
item.description: Tauthe is a bit shorter and rounder than the other Aqrabuamelu. She is the opposite of Davcina in that she has a round open face but is a bit caustic.

item.title: Jindal-Witten, Eesha 'Eleanor'/'Ella'
item.description: Relationships Father Henry Jindal-Witten Mother Navneet Jindal-Witten Brother Harish “Harry” Jindal-Witten Ex-boyfriend Jae-Young Park Roommate Jade Ndereba Our heroine is 167cm / 5'6" with bronze skin from her half-Indian heritage. Brown eyes naturally and black hair. She starts the story at 25 years old and first-year Physics Ph.D student at NYU.

item.title: Jindal-Witten, Harish 'Harry'
item.description: Relationships Father Henry Jindal-Witten Mother Navneet Jindal-Witten Sister Eesha Jindal-Witten The annoying little brother. Senior at Francis Lewis High School in Queens.

item.title: Jindal-Witten, Henry
item.description: Relationships Spouse Navneet Jindal-Witten Son Harish Jindal-Witten Daughter Eesha Jindal-Witten Ella’s father. Tall (188cm / 6'2"), broad shouldered, a light dusting of freckles, blue-green eyes, and tousled brown hair. Basically a very handsome guy with a square jaw. Was a soap opera actor, minor love interest in several movies before going back to school and eventually become a professor of anthropology.

item.title: Jindal-Witten, Navneet
item.description: Relationships Spouse Henry Jindal-Witten Son Harish Jindal-Witten Daughter Eesha Jindal-Witten Ella’s mother. Short (160cm / 5'4"), petite and perhaps more attractive than her husband. If undercut by her knowing it. Always super-fashionable and put together, she is the kind of person who would put on makeup before the apocalypse and take time to adjust it during.Trauma surgeon at New York Presbytarian in Queens.

item.description: Ella and Jae-Young go to Iceland

item.title: 01.022 Coffee
item.description: Ella and Jae-Young plan for Iceland and catch Kothin listening in

item.title: 01.013 Sparring
item.description: Now you see the true power of Ella’s very mild enhanced healing. Since this is a rational, progression story with an entirely optional litrpg backbone, I wanted to have a bit of slice of life period showing that she is intensely following up on her action items. So this is part of the training montage for hand-to-hand. Since I know about fighting than physics expect me to spend more time on those scenes rather than her studying.

item.title: 01.012 Halloween
item.description: A bit more training montage, but I wanted to bring back in some magic and even a sense of wonder. I feel like I missed the mark a bit. But that is okay. I am not a hard magic guy for the most part despite some of my rpg type posts - my eyes glaze over at most hard magic systems, so I prefer it to be a bit ineffable. That will get harder as we get to learning more about magic, I want to have the system underneath to keep it somewhat real, but to the reader it needs to feel like, well, magic.

item.title: 01.011 Breathe
item.description: I was going for that calm before the storm vibe here, she is mentally getting her head into the game a bit. Taking stock. Taking time with her family. I’ll probably come back and build this out when I do a big second pass to build on that feel more. But sometimes a chapter is just short.

item.title: 01.010 Prep
item.description: Dealing with one’s parents is often something that is brushed over in fantasy. You can’t have adventures with watchful parents. I somewhat get around this by having my protagonist be older, in grad school. But that doesn’t mean she is estranged from her family, just exasperated sometimes. Her father being an actor once and now a professor and her mother being a physician is intentional. She comes from an educated background but not one that is solely that way.

item.title: 01.009 Exposition
item.description: Who knew that dwarves were trolls? Sorry I couldn’t help myself. Obviously I wanted to subvert the trope a bit that dwarves were either fools like in LOTR or stoic. At the same time, I also added my own spin on them, making them rock-like creatures that are a bit more alien in nature than humans. There is always a bit of give and take with that since you have to balance their alieness with their ability to interact in a meaningful way with humans.

item.title: 01.008 Interlude Kennington
item.description: This chapter I am always going to say was super hard. First, I was trying to write a character I can’t even say I pretend to understand, a council estates kid in Kennington, London from Brixton. So I am going to completely fuck up the vernacular and regional differences. He is teamed up with a native East Londoner from Kennington and a Brazilian Portuguese girl and they run into a couple Haitian pretwo lwa. Second, I wanted it to be very in media res, but given how fast things go south, I had to move a bunch of stuff up front.

item.title: 01.007 Again
item.description: This chapter was more difficult to write than the others - lots of establishing new characters and trying to imply familial relationships but with a hopefully light touch. Maybe I crammed too many conversations in here and didn’t let each one breathe, but it is a trade-off between endless dialog and moving things along, and in this story, it was just a bit of a breather. Next chapter will be radically different. Also, Ella switching between her American name and Indian name is very intentional.

item.title: 01.006 Acceptance
item.description: This was all Ella needing to feel real, and I did not expect it when I wrote it. A lot of the time characters pull you along with their own actions, and you just let them. She kind of skipped from denial to the end. Was it truly acceptance or was it her just going a bit more wild? I kind of thought of her as a third date kind of girl, but sometimes your own characters surprise you.

item.title: 01.020 History
item.description: Ella hears a story of ice elves

item.title: 01.021 Reset
item.description: Ella over does it and needs an intervention

item.title: 01.018 Farflung Interests
item.description: Kothin is working at a lithium mine in Chile

item.title: 01.019 Anxiety
item.description: Ella goes shooting

item.title: 01.005 The Date
item.description: After the disappointment Ella experienced in her last chapter, I felt like I needed to kickstart the story with more evidence and someone else who maybe knows a little bit more than her. Most YA stories start with the parents dying so nobody can protect or explain what is going on - and the slow reveal is important to build this. But you can be slow, and you can be glacial. So Jae-Young shows up. A guy who asked her out early on but they only got around to a date now.

item.title: 01.005 The Date
item.description: Ella goes out on a date

item.title: 01.004 You Can't Go Back
item.description: Ella is very good at denial but the cracks are showing. She puts back on the denial at the end but how much longer can it last.

item.title: 01.003 The Party
item.description: I encourage you to channel some Sailor Moon magical girl sequencing here. Get your mind out of the gutter though - no semi-nude intermediate step. Footnotes are purely optional and just for fun. Being much older, I will have to work on making my music choices more age appropriate, but I figured an orc DJ can be any age.

item.title: 01.002 One Month Later
item.description: Yes it is a bit of a skip ahead, but often I find that the pacing of stories feels unrealistic. Also a month of having crystalline white eyes and putting in contacts to cover them makes it feel more real that she is back to living her life for the most part. And then you get ambushed by a party. A magical dance party in Harlem on your way up town. Charlie doesn’t get past the red rope of magic.

item.title: 01.001 Vision
item.description: A quick intro Well here we go… I wanted to include some chapter by chapter commentary as I write these, but didn’t want unnecessary author’s notes, nor did I want them to be attached to the chapters directly. Think of this as the purely optional director’s track. And, to be fair, I will spoil the chapters as I see fit, so read those first. When I started this story, I had a couple goals in mind.
